body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. My name is Johnny Alexander and I work for Car Experts Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Hannah. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - three two one - eight nine zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And may I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Hannah. Is there anything else you'd like to add regarding the issue with your billing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm feeling relieved now that we've sorted it out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Thank you for your time and for contacting us, Hannah. If you need any further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
